data.name: Sex Adventures - The Job Interview
data.detailed_description:
A visual novel about a young woman named Jessica, who is willing to do almost anything to succeed at her job interview.

Visual Novel Description
Jessica is desperately looking for a new job.
She is almost 3 weeks behind with the rent and she would do almost anything to get a decent salary.
Everything goes well with her customer support interview until the woman from human resources makes her do something out of the ordinary.
After all, the HR manager has to find the best (female) employees for Mr. Hill.
Will Jessica be a good girl and do as she is told?
Or she will walk out the door and file a sexual harassment complaint?
Everything changes when she sees the employment contract and the possible remuneration for that “position”.
Live the fantasy as you follow Jessica making the “best” wrong decisions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
